modules.description: Provides functions to parse, manipulate, and solve CUDF constraints using a multi-criteria approach, including conflict detection and resolution. Operates on CUDF data structures such as packages, dependencies, and constraints, along with GLPK-based optimization routines. Used to determine feasible package installations under multiple conflicting criteria in software dependency management.

Provides functions to convert Cudf packages into a problem structure and resolve them using specified solvers. Operates on Cudf data structures and solver backends, supporting multiple resolution strategies. Used to analyze package dependencies and generate solutions within defined constraints like timeout and MIP gap.
